_header: Lend me your pretty mouth madame
_description: A Dialogue between a lover and his mistress by Charles d’Orléans — three 8-line stanzas and 4-line Envoy

BLHar682.First Lines:
LEnde me yowre praty mouth madameSe how y knele here at yowre
                    feet…
BLHar682.Last Lines:
…Nay erst lo must ye this avertHow y seide or ye it
                    ocupy
